seo: CVE-2022-38463, ServiceNow, XSS检测, 漏洞扫描
seo_en: CVE-2022-38463, ServiceNow, XSS detection, vulnerability scanning
summary: 该插件用于检测ServiceNow应用中是否存在CVE-2022-38463相关的XSS漏洞，通过构造特定URL请求并分析响应内容判断漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether there is a CVE-2022-38463 related XSS vulnerability in the ServiceNow application. It constructs specific URL requests and analyzes the response content to determine if the vulnerability exists.
